thread.title: Back to the Future: The History of Laptops -- LONDON, Octob
thread.title_full: Back to the Future: The History of Laptops -- LONDON, Octob

author: COS Sales
title: Back to the Future: The History of Laptops -- LONDON, Octob
text:
LONDON , October 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Celebrate Back to the Future day with the History of Laptops  
To celebrate 'Back to the Future' day- the 21 st October 2015 , the day which Doc and Marty would have landed in the future- COS Sales have put together an exciting piece of interactive content that looks at the progression of laptops over time. This is put into perspective by finding out how much of an SD or HD version of Back to the Future could fit on these laptops.
This retro content looks at the percentage of Back to the Future that could fit onto laptops across the decades, and is filled with great facts and figures about each specific computer.  
You can view the interactive content here:   
http://www.cossales.com/b2tf/history-of-laptops.html 
About COS Sales:  
COS Sales is a leading office equipment lease and sales site, and is excited to be taking part and celebrating in an event that many of us have been looking forward to for years. 

SOURCE COS Sales
